page.title: 11TANYFRON
page.content:
{Tanyfron}is the other village in the south western corner of the square.It is far smaller than Coedpoeth and was founded by the need for workers at the{Vron Colliery}which started production at the end of the 19th Century.The colliery is now closed.
The remainder of the land around Tanyfron which is not being used for industrial purposes is given up to grazing of Friesian cattle and for the growing of silage to feed the herds during the winter months.The land is hilly with dividing sections of hedges which include a copious number of deciduous trees.
